title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI (chat, model list, logs) built with Go and Bubble Tea.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS-Code extension.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 30+ recipes: RAG, function-calling, structured extraction, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker-Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Weaviate, PostgresML, etc.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official NVIDIA GPU optimization layer for Ollama; enables tensor-parallel & FP16.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma in 100 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels with thread support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that wraps Ollama for rapid prototyping of local LLM apps.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for offline tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with Tokio.
